title: Reasons for rise of urban centers, increased trade

content.question: Which of the following factors helps explain the rise of urban centers and the increase in trade in Afro-Eurasia during the second half of the thirteenth century?

choices.label: The increase in all forms of coerced labor to build housing
The decline of the Mongol khanates across Asia
The reopening of Indian Ocean trade networks by Chinese explorers
The availability of safe and reliable transport along land-based trade routes

content.answer: The availability of safe and reliable transport along land-based trade routes
